CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst College relative to Aether University?
SRP.A: Starburst College is {below} Aether University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether University relative to Starburst College?
SRP.A: Aether University is {above} Starburst College in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Research relative to Aether University?
SRP.A: Echo Research is {above} Aether University in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst College}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Research}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether University's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1970}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst College's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst College's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1960}.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1961 higher or lower than in 1966?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1961 was {higher} than in 1966.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1970 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1970 was {lower} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1960 higher or lower than in 1967?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1960 was {lower} than in 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1971, did the total Research Grants Awarded experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1971?
NC.A: The change in total research grants awarded between 1968 and 1971 was {larger} than between 1966 and 1971.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst College} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aether University and Starburst College first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aether University and Starburst College first exchanged leading positions in {1961}.
